medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began in the periumbilical area yesterday around 10AM, worsened throughout the day and overnight migrated to the RLQ. Pain is currently worsening, non-radiating, and exacerbated by movement. Patient endorses chills and fevers to 100.5 at home, has had a poor appetite, and last bowel movement was 2 days ago.
